title: OnOptions
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from OnOptions, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: American Express to Pay $230 Million in Fines for Aggressive Sales Practices
items.description: The Wall Street Journal had reported on a series of deceptive and strong-arm tactics the card company used to increase small business sign-ups.

items.title: Your Money in the New Trump Administration: Four Things to Watch
items.description: Taxes, crypto, student loans and mortgages might be in for big changes over the next four years.

items.title: Shares of Cartier owner Richemont jump 16% as sales rise in December quarter
items.description: Cartier owner Richemont on Thursday reported a 10% increase in third quarter sales even as China demand weighed.

items.title: What Happens When Your House Burns Down and You Still Have a Mortgage?
items.description: Borrowers are still on the hook but might be able to pause payments.

items.title: Bank of America tops estimates on better-than-expected investment banking, interest income
items.description: The company said fourth-quarter profit more than doubled to $6.67 billion, or 82 cents per share, from a year earlier.

items.title: U.S. Stocks Slip; Investors Dig Into More Bank Earnings
items.description: The Nasdaq, S&P 500 and Dow industrials were pulled lower by declines in tech shares. Bank of America and Morgan Stanley said profit more than doubled...

items.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Higher
items.description: Gold settled 1.2% higher and silver rose nearly 0.7%, with both metals up for three consecutive sessions.

items.title: Morgan Stanley tops estimates on strong equities and fixed income trading revenue
items.description: While bank stocks have been supported by enthusiasm for rising deal activity, it was actually the trading side that helped Morgan Stanley more in the ...

items.title: Citigroup swings to fourth-quarter profit, tops estimates on investment banking strength
items.description: The fourth-quarter report comes after a year where Citi's stock rose almost 37%, outperforming the S&P 500.

items.title: TSMC net profit hits record high as fourth-quarter results top expectations on robust AI chip demand
